item.content:encoded:
Cofounder Blogist LLC

Software developer and entrepreneur with over a decade of hands-on industry experience. I’m passionate about building and shipping products that solve real problems. I intend to use this blog to share my approach to building web applications and capture my learnings along the way.

Check out what I’m working on now.

item.description: I’m a cofounder at Blogist LLC focusing on the product, engineering, and company strategy. We help brands and influencers find and build…
item.content:encoded: I’m a cofounder at Blogist LLC focusing on the product, engineering, and company strategy. We help brands and influencers find and build relationships with one another and collaborate on campaigns together.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my first post! I’ve been learning and using web technologies for almost two decades and have helped ship web applications used by…
item.content:encoded:
This is my first post! I’ve been learning and using web technologies for almost two decades and have helped ship web applications used by both individuals and businesses both as a hobby and profession. I wanted to start this blog to help share my thoughts and experiences with different technologies involved in developing production-grade web applications.

Stay tuned!
